com.yazdankhah.cipher.type

Class Register

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yazdankhah.cipher.type.Register

  • public class Register
extends java.lang.Object
    Simulates a register of any logicalSize from 1 to 63.
    Author:
    ahmad

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Register(java.lang.String name, char c0, char c1)
      This constructor is used when we want to initialize the object with two characters.
      Register(java.lang.String name, int size) 
      Register(java.lang.String name, int size, long val)
      It can be instantiated by binary, hex, integer, char, or long numbers.
